name: JV Micronics
overview:
Inaugurated in the year 2012, at Faridabad (Haryana, India), we, “JV Micronics”, are the leading names engaged in Manufacturing, Exporting & Trading of comprehensive assortment of RF Anechoic Chamber, RF Absorbers, Anechoic Box, EMI EMC Shielded Chamber, Radiation Protection Dress, Foxcom Satcom Solution, Foxcom Multi Family Housing TV Distribution and Foxcom Iridium Indoor Repeater, etc. We supply and provide after sale service repair and maintenance of Foxcom (ISRAEL), Gold Series of Interfacility Links, Classic Series C, X and KU Band Interfacility Links, VSAT-Light Series, Platinum Modules etc. Our Products are manufactured using optimum quality raw material and sophisticated technology, these are designed with high precision to meet the universal standards.

Product Portfolio:

Manufacturing, Exporting & Trading of comprehensive assortment of RF Anechoic Chamber, RF Absorbers, Anechoic Box, EMI EMC Shielded Chamber, Radiation Protection Dress, Foxcom Satcom Solution, Foxcom Multi Family Housing TV Distribution and Foxcom Iridium Indoor Repeater, etc. We supply and provide after sale service repair and maintenance of Foxcom (ISRAEL), Gold Series of Interfacility Links, Classic Series C, X and KU Band Interfacility Links, VSAT-Light Series, Platinum Modules etc.

Quality:

We are a quality oriented organization and thus we are highly focused on providing our prestigious customers the finest quality products. Additionally, we have a team of quality control experts, who keep a close eye on the entire production process to ensure that we are providing customers only the best quality products.

Client Satisfaction:

As a client centric company, we are striving hard to offer clients ultimate level of contentment. Our team of experts works in close-coordination with the customers achieve their highest level of satisfaction. As an organization, we completely understand the expectations and the requirements of the customers and thus we always come up with excellent quality every time.

Our Infrastructure:

We are backed by high tech infrastructure for the production of our extensive range of Microwave Anechoic Chambers, and Rf Absorbers, etc. Furthermore, we have also segregated our large infrastructure into various departments like manufacturing, quality control, sales & marketing, etc. for hassle free business operations.
